post.text: The liberal biased media make complete fools out of themselves the way they fawn over Crooked Hillary. It's SAD, DISHONEST and PATHETIC reporting!

comment.author: Dametriese
comment.text: Trump, NO MORE PRESS CONFERENCES PLEASE. If Hillary doesn't do them, why should you? Let's play this smartüëçüèª

replies.author: Logan
replies.text: Oh no - let him get out there and do his thing - We will win - no hiding from the press - he never has so why start now
